title: About nothing = O nicem
creator_credit: William Bukovy, Pavel Hobl, Jan Brychta, Vlastimil Brodsky, Kratky Film and Vstredni Pujcouna Film
brief_description: An unusual animated story about a character called “Nothing”, that teases the mind in a delightful and challenging way. “Nothing” gets into the most difficult situations but - after finding a job in a circus he discovers he can successfully help the sad clown and others become happy and able to make fun again. Note: Czechoslovakian language - no subtitles.
